mapper.select: select a.*, b.member_name sender_name, c.member_name member_name from (SELECT MAX(MSG_IDX) KEEP ( DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY MSG_IDX DESC) AS MSG_IDX , MAX(MEMBER_NUMBER) KEEP ( DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY MSG_IDX DESC) AS MEMBER_NUMBER , MAX(SENDER_NUMBER) KEEP ( DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY MSG_IDX DESC) AS SENDER_NUMBER , MAX(MSG_CONTENT) KEEP ( DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY MSG_IDX DESC) AS MSG_CONTENT , MAX(SENDDATE) KEEP ( DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY MSG_IDX DESC) AS SENDDATE , MAX(OPENDATE) KEEP ( DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY MSG_IDX DESC) AS OPENDATE FROM MESSAGE WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{member_number} OR SENDER_NUMBER = #{member_number} GROUP BY GREATEST(MEMBER_NUMBER, SENDER_NUMBER) || LEAST(MEMBER_NUMBER, SENDER_NUMBER))a, (select member_number, member_name from member) b, (select member_number, member_name from member) c where a.SENDER_NUMBER = b.member_number and a.MEMBER_NUMBER = c.member_number
